EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2351.B.Email 5 - Single RAN Executive Summary an
EmailTemplate.subject: Single RAN, the straight-line route to emission-free networks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tackle network complexity and global warming at the same time Nokia Single RAN Advanced <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200241]]> Keep your radio network simple with Single RAN Cut complexity by running multiple technologies on shared hardware. The result? Lower costs, simpler operations and easier evolution to technologies like 4.5G Pro. Read the executive summary <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200241]]> ► By reversing the growing complexity of radio access networks, Nokia Single RAN Advanced enables seamless evolution to zero carbon emissions.
You also gain more flexibility, greater capacity, simpler operations and higher energy efficiency.
It’s all part of our commitment to help you move to zero emissions and support efforts to tackle global warming. <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2227.Turningthezerocarbonvisionintobusinessopportunity.html]]> Turning the zero carbon vision into business opportunity Reducing CO2 emissions saves money and contributes to limiting global warming.
Our Zero Emission Solution advanced software, hardware and renewables cut emissions and costs. View the webinar <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2227.Turningthezerocarbonvisionintobusinessopportunity.html]]> ► © 2016 Nokia.
